description: Honestly, the best way to reach out to me is via a Direct Message on any of my social accounts. That being said, my email is always open and I will try my best to get back to you as soon as possible. We can talk about technoloy, food, music, unicorns or really anything nice and geeky! I enjoy sharing my experiences, but I enjoy hearing others' personal journeys and opinions more. So feel free to say hello to me anytime!
